header.title: Our Engagements
header.description: Discover our diverse range of programs designed to empower youth in the field of international diplomacy and global affairs.

summitBanner.title: Digital Diplomacy Summit 2025
summitBanner.description: Includes official visits to international organizations and city tour. Join emerging leaders from around the world for an immersive experience in digital diplomacy.

dynamicEngagements.title: Dynamic Engagements
dynamicEngagements.p1: Our flagship program brings together young leaders, policymakers, and experts in interactive forums designed to tackle pressing global challenges. These engagements create spaces for meaningful dialogue and solution-building.
dynamicEngagements.p2: Participants engage in policy debates, develop position papers, and present recommendations to decision-makers at national and international levels.
bullets: Youth Perspectives on Global Migration Policies
Innovating Humanitarian Response in Conflict Zones

diplomacySimulations.title: Diplomacy Simulations
diplomacySimulations.p1: Experience the complexities of international relations through our realistic diplomatic simulations. Participants assume roles as country delegates, NGO representatives, or international organization officials to negotiate solutions to global challenges.
diplomacySimulations.p2: Our simulations recreate environments such as:

relatedEvents.title: Youth & Civil Society in Resolving Conflicts (Aug 4)

workshops.title: Workshops & Training
workshops.description: Develop essential diplomatic skills through our specialized workshops led by experienced practitioners. Our practical training sessions equip participants with tools for effective international engagement.

cards.title: Negotiation Skills
cards.desc: Master the art of diplomatic negotiation.

relatedEvents.title: Intercultural Communication in the Modern World (Nov 20)

culturalDiplomacy.title: Cultural Diplomacy
culturalDiplomacy.p1: Bridge cultural divides and build mutual understanding through our cultural diplomacy initiatives. These programs use arts, language, cuisine, and shared experiences to foster connections between young leaders from diverse backgrounds.

relatedEvents.title: Intercultural Communication in the Modern World (Nov 20)
